bibl.title: Ancient Jewish Magic. A History.
bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. Jewish magic: a contradiction in terms? - 2. Jewish magic in the Second Temple period. - 3. Jewish magic in late antiquity - the insider evidence. - 4. Non-Jewish elements in late-antique Jewish magic. - 5. How "Jewish" was ancient Jewish magic? - 6. Magic and magicians in rabbinic literature. - Epilogue. - Bibliography. Index. - See in part. Chapters 3 and 4: uses widely the evidence of the P.G.M.
